verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:24
verses.text: The children of Judah that bare shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, ready armed to the war.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:25
verses.text: Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:26
verses.text: Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:27
verses.text: And Jehoiada was the leader of the Aaronites, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 12:28
verses.text: And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father’s house twenty and two captains.
